data.title: Nice building
data.text: What a nice old building in the center of the town right across from the train station. Unfortunate museum is only open Thursday Friday and Saturdays. It looks like it could be a nice little piece of historical information

owner_response.author: HSLS_Museum1865, Public Relations Manager at Lee's Summit History Museum, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the review! We wish we were open more hours too, hopefully when we build our volunteer base up we can do that.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: On the way to being a great little museum
data.text: Even though the museum was closed that day we were lucky enough to find a very knowledgeable and charming member who graciously agreed to give us a tour.  The displays are well thought out and presented in an educational but fun way.   Lots to see and we could have spent more time but were grateful for the tour that we had.  Stop is and see this great little museum.  We will be back.

owner_response.author: HSLS_Museum1865, Guest Relations Manager at Lee's Summit History Museum, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind review. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great local attraction
data.text: Had a wonderful time here. Ask for Stephanie she does a great job. She made us feel welcome and was so informative.
